products.title: Cocorico Box 16 Pieces
products.subtitle: Pépites Box
products.consume_advice: At its most delicious within 5 weeks of purchase
products.description: Did you know? In Latin, the word "gallus" means both "Gaul" and "rooster"! Historically, the rooster appeared on Gaulish coins — today, it appears on our treats! In collaboration with the Élysée - Presidency of the Republic brand, Chocolat Alain Ducasse pays tribute to the French symbol and includes the word "Cocorico" inscribed on its pépites. These indulgent treats conceal a dual-praliné heart: hazelnut praline &amp; almond nib praliné for the dark chocolate version, and almond praliné &amp; hazelnut vanilla praliné for the milk chocolate. Proceeds contribute to the funding of the renovation of the Élysée Palace, helping to enhance this historic monument and open it to the French population, 300 years after its construction.

products.title: Soveria candied Ginger
products.consume_advice: At its most delicious within 4 weeks of purchase
products.description: It is in Soveria, a small village in Corsica, that craftsmen manufacture oranges, lemons, grapefruit and ginger. After a night's rest they are then individually cut, before being coated with cocoa powder, with the exception of candied ginger.  The final step exalts their natural flavours: a thin coating of dark chocolate... For a very delicious and delectable result.
